data.text: @NotMeMichael @thehill Lol, like which? All the red states regularly run deficits and all the blue states pay more in than they consume.
@thehill Why should states who shut down their entire economies for two years be bailed out by states who managed to keep their local economies strong?  Lockdowns and quarantines have consequences.

@thehill With sincere gratitude in my heart I'm
doing this open testimony so others will know
what Melissa Taylor did for me and my family, 💙❤️ you should
also join the winning team @Taylor_trader_
@thehill Let's just keep our money and call it good

@thehill For all those who are new to this working from home Bitcoin trading options 

Here's a little tip:

Get a trusted Bitcoin expert and stick to her @Lisa_Laura39

Invest and play at similar times each day.
Because :
